projects.title: PinoyCampground
projects.description: A full-featured campground app with interactive map, campground creation, clustering of locations, Google login, email-based password reset, and OTP verification for account creation.

projects.title: CryptoView
projects.description: A React-based cryptocurrency dashboard built for learning purposes as part of a course project, showcasing API integration and data visualization.
